document_data.name: Misbahd
document_data.caption: A map showing Misbahd on the western coast of Sahu.
document_data.mainbody: '''Misbahd''' was a village on the sparsely populated island of [[Sahu]] in the [[Crowded Sea]] of [[east Zakhara]] in the early 1400s [[DR]].{{Ne-time}}. The village was located on the northern coast below the plateau dominating the island's interior.
document_data.Inhabitants: The majority of the inhabitants were concerned with piracy and dealing with goods gained that way.
document_data.Defenses: Misbahd was also protected by fortifications and a number of allied ships.
